'''Ruins''' may refer to:

== Minecraft ==
=== Structures ===
* {{EnvLink|Ocean Ruins}}, an underwater structure made of [[stone bricks]] or [[sandstone]].
* {{EnvLink|Trail Ruins}}, a buried structure from a lost culture<ref>https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/14204477222157-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-19-80-22</ref> that can be found on land and underwater.
* {{EnvLink|Ruined Portal}}, a broken [[Nether portal]] with crying obsidian.
